bioconda.name: bioconductor-rgraphviz
bioconda.summary: Provides plotting capabilities for R graph objects

biotools.summary: Interfaces R with the AT and T graphviz library for plotting R graph objects from the graph package.

bioschemas.name: Rgraphviz
bioschemas.summary: Interfaces R with the AT and T graphviz library for plotting R graph objects from the graph package.
